effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: "Bullet-Proof" Vestplate
description: See the bullet holes? Dat's da proof.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Become the pinnacle of Gallagio service excellence and dole out Kaja'Cola Mega-Lite to injured allies 10 times over 4 sec, healing them for 1 million and increasing their Speed by 1,945 for 5 sec. The number of servings is increased by your Haste. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Channel to vent flames for 2 sec, dealing 2.7 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies.

Mechanical enemies become Superheated, taking 132,454  additional Fire damage when struck by your next harmful ability. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

name: Tattered Iron Horde Tabard
description: Troops often claim the uniforms of their defeated foes.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Tabard of the Dark Iron
